text.author: Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia
text.title: Jeanne Moreau
text.summary: Jeanne Moreau was an award winning French actress, singer, screenwriter and director, best known for starring in the films Elevator to the Gallows (1958) and Jules et Jim (1962).
